# beginView()

**Instance Method**

Begins recording a view-through impression when ad content corresponding to the impression becomes visible.

## Declaration

```swift
func beginView() async throws
```

## Discussion

Begin the view impression process by calling [doc://com.apple.AdAttributionKit/documentation/AdAttributionKit/AppImpression/beginView()], as  the following example shows:

```swift
   func handleAdAppeared(impression: AppImpression) async {
       do {
           try await impression.beginView()
       }
       catch {
           print("Failed to begin view-through impression: \(error).")
       }
   }
```

## Displaying view-through ads

- **endView()**: Ends the view-through impression when the ad content corresponding to the impression disappears.
- **handleView()**: Handles a view through ad impression.
